thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: AEP Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.92

author: Reuters Editorial
title: AEP Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.92
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - American Electric Power Company Inc :
* AEP REPORTS 2018 FIRST-QUARTER EARNINGS
* COMPANY REAFFIRMS 2018 OPERATING EARNINGS GUIDANCE * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.98 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.89 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY REVENUE $4.0 BILLION VERSUS $3.9 BILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR
* SEES 2018 ESTIMATED EPS ON A GAAP BASIS $3.71 TO $3.91 * AMERICAN ELECTRIC POWER COMPANY - BENEFITTED FROM MORE NORMAL WINTER WEATHER IN Q1 OF 2018, COMPARED WITH LAST YEAR
* AMERICAN ELECTRIC POWER - SEEING POSITIVE ECONOMIC INDICATORS IN REGIONS CO SERVES
* “IMPACT OF FEDERAL TAX REFORM IS NEUTRAL FOR OUR REGULATED OPERATING EARNINGS PERFORMANCE” Source text for Eikon:
